question: For which of the following function , Balban appointed Khwajas
option2: For estimation of income and expenditure
answer: For estimation of income and expenditure
explanation: In order to examine the actual collection and expenditure of the Iqta lands , Balban appointed a new category of officials called Khwajas to estimate the income of the Iqta holders as well as the expanses they incurred in maintaining their troops .
